name: uni-app全平台项目模板
description: uni-app全平台统一开发模板，支持小程序、H5、App多端发布，基于Vue3+TypeScript
author: Development-Standards Team

code_templates.page_template:
<template>
  <view class="container">
    <uni-nav-bar :title="title" :border="false" :fixed="true" />
    <view class="content">
      <!-- 页面内容 -->
    </view>
  </view>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue';
import { onLoad, onShow, onPullDownRefresh } from '@dcloudio/uni-app';

const title = ref('{PageTitle}');

onLoad((options: any) => {
  console.log('页面参数:', options);
});

onShow(() => {
  console.log('页面显示');
});

onPullDownRefresh(() => {
  // 下拉刷新逻辑
  setTimeout(() => {
    uni.stopPullDownRefresh();
  }, 1000);
});

onMounted(() => {
  console.log('组件挂载完成');
});
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.container {
  min-height: 100vh;
  background-color: #f8f8f8;
}

.content {
  padding: 20rpx;
  margin-top: 88rpx;
}
</style>
code_templates.component_template:
<template>
  <view class="{component-name}">
    <slot></slot>
  </view>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref, computed } from 'vue';

interface Props {
  title?: string;
  disabled?: boolean;
}

const props = withDefaults(defineProps<Props>(), {
  title: '',
  disabled: false
});

const emit = defineEmits<{
  click: [event: Event];
}>();

const handleClick = (event: Event) => {
  if (!props.disabled) {
    emit('click', event);
  }
};
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.{component-name} {
  // 组件样式
}
</style>
